name: Simply Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'minced green onion'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'minced fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper, to taste'}
steps: Stir together the avocado and lemon juice in a serving bowl; add the green onion and cilantro; mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately or store covered in refrigerator with avocado pits in the bowl to keep from browning.

name: Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'roma (plum) tomatoes, diced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced onion'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground cayenne pepper (Optional)'}

name: Easy Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe tomato, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}

name: Traditional Mexican Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Mash avocados in a bowl until creamy.. Mix tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lemon juice, and jalapeño pepper into mashed avocado until well combined. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Best Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Cut avocados into halves. Remove seeds and scoop out the pulp into a small bowl. Use a fork to mash the avocado.. Stir in lemon juice, onion, olive oil, and salt. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.

name: Easy Never Forgotten Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(3 ounce) packages', 'name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'salsa'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'onion powder'}
steps: In a small bowl, mix together the avocados, sour cream, cream cheese and salsa. Blend to desired consistency.. In a small bowl mix the salt, pepper, garlic salt and onion powder. Stir into the avocado mixture. Cover and chill in the refrigerator 1/2 hour before serving.

name: Quick and Easy Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'avocados, peeled, pitted, and diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'seasoned salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}
steps: Combine avocados, green onions, cilantro, seasoned salt, black pepper, garlic, and lime juice in a bowl; mash with a spoon or potato masher until mostly smooth with small chunks.

name: Chef John's Classic Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced fresh serrano chili'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro, divided'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely diced white onion'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt for grinding vegetables, plus more to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'Hass avocados'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced ripe tomatoes, drained (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced, or more to taste'}
steps: Place minced peppers, 1/4 cup of the chopped cilantro, and the diced onions on a cutting board. Chop them together into very small pieces. Sprinkle with kosher salt. Using the flat side of the knife blade, smear the mixture to work it into a paste, and chop again to achieve as fine a texture as possible.. Stem, halve, and pit the avocados. Scoop out flesh and place in a bowl. Add 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, onion and serrano mixture, salt, and fresh lime juice. Mash with a potato masher to desired texture (smooth or chunky), 5 or 6 minutes. Taste and adjust seasonings. If not serving immediately, cover and refrigerate.

name: Avocado-Spinach Dip
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced avocado'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'reduced-fat sour cream'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped red onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped seeded jalapeno pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'garlic clove'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'hot sauce'}
steps: Process spinach, avocado, sour cream, red onion, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, garlic, salt, black pepper, and hot sauce in a food processor until smooth.. Scrape dip into a serving bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.

name: Basic Guacamole Dip
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'ripe avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'tomatoes, diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}
steps: Mix avocados, tomatoes, onion, and lemon juice together in a bowl until thoroughly combined. Serve immediately. Store any unused dip in the refrigerator.

name: LuvAnn's Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted and diced'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'tomato, diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'onion, diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'jalapeño peppers, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}
steps: Mash avocados in a medium bowl until desired consistency is reached. Stir in salt. Mix in tomato, onion, jalapeño peppers, lime juice, and cilantro until combined.. Cover and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.

name: Savory Mango Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'red onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mango - peeled, pitted, and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}
steps: Mash avocados in a medium bowl to a lumpy consistency. Mix in onion, mango, lime juice, garlic, salt, and cilantro.

name: Daddy's Guacamole Dip
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados, halved with pits removed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cottage cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomatoes, diced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced sweet onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'jalapeño pepper, seeded and minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Scoop avocado flesh out of the skins and place into a medium mixing bowl; discard skins. Add lemon juice to the bowl and mash well. Add cottage cheese, tomatoes, onion, jalapeño, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; stir until combined. Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

name: Fresh Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'roma (plum) tomato, diced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red onion, diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano chile pepper, seeded and minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'drops', 'name': 'hot sauce'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cilantro leaves, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}
steps: Combine the avocado, tomato, onion, serrano chile, salt, pepper, garlic powder, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, and cilantro leaves in a bowl and mix. Pour lime juice over the top of the guacamole. Serve immediately. To store for later use, place avocado pit in the bowl with the guacamole and then cover with plastic wrap, pressing the wrap down to the surface of the guacamole and store in refrigerator.

name: Corn and Black Bean Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red bell pepper, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red onion, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(15.25 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweet corn, drained'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'black beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground black pepper, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste'}
steps: Stir red bell pepper, red onion, garlic, sweet corn, black beans, and avocado slices together in a large bowl.. Mix lime juice, salt, black pepper, and cilantro into avocado mixture until desired texture is achieved.

name: Tomatillo Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomatillos, husked and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red onion, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'drops', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: In a medium bowl, mix avocados, tomatillos, red onion, roma tomatoes, and lime juice. Season with red pepper flakes, hot pepper sauce, and salt and pepper. Cover, and refrigerate at least 45 minutes before serving.

name: Chipotle Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados, peeled, seeded and cubed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'salsa, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'adobo sauce from canned chilies, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Mash together cubed avocado, lime juice, sour cream, salsa, and adobo sauce in a bowl until blended. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Avocado and Black Bean Dip
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocado - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'black beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'sea salt to taste'}
steps: Mix avocado, black beans, lime juice, and garlic together in a microwave-safe bowl. Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese.. Microwave dip on high until cheese is melted, about 1 minute. Season with sea salt if desired.

name: Tasty Tomatillo Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh tomatillos, husks discarded and tomatillos rinsed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, quartered'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno peppers, seeded if desired'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, or amount to cover'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, halved lengthwise and pitted'}
steps: Place tomatillos, onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers into a saucepan over medium heat, and pour in enough water to cover. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until the tomatillos soften and change color from bright green to a yellow-green color, 5 to 8 minutes.. With a slotted spoon, transfer vegetables to a blender, filling the pitcher no more than halfway full. Hold down the lid of the blender with a folded kitchen towel, and carefully start the blender, using a few quick pulses to get the tomatillo mixture moving before leaving it on to puree. Puree until smooth, about 1 minute; mix in salt, cilantro, and lime juice. Blend again for a few seconds just to mix.. Scoop out the avocado flesh, and place into the blender; blend until well mixed. Adjust salt, cilantro, and lime juice before serving.

name: Spicy Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Roma tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'scallions, white parts only, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno peppers, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}
steps: Add avocados and lemon juice to a medium mixing bowl; mash until desired consistency is almost reached. Stir in tomatoes, scallions, jalapeno peppers, garlic, cilantro, salt, red pepper flakes, pepper, and cayenne. Taste guacamole and adjust for seasoning.

name: Guacamole with Corn
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'plum tomato, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano chile, seeded and finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8.75 ounce) can', 'name': 'whole kernel corn, drained and rinsed'}
steps: Mash avocados, lime juice, and salt together in a medium bowl. Mix in tomato, onion, serrano chile, and olive oil. Stir in corn kernels. Serve immediately.

name: Guacamole with Nopales (Mexican Cactus)
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced nopales (Mexican cactus)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'ripe avocado, halved and pitted'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'plum tomato, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh jalapeno pepper - seeded, deveined, and minced, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh cilantro, chopped'}
steps: Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add nopales and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 10 minutes. Let cool.. Mash avocado in a bowl with lime juice, olive oil, and salt. Stir in tomato, jalapeno, cilantro, and cooked nopales.

name: Lite Brocamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocado, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large head', 'name': 'fresh broccoli'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'red onion, minced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Boil or steam broccoli until very soft.. In a large bowl, mash broccoli with avocado. Mix in onions, garlic, lime juice, hot pepper sauce, and cilantro until mixture resembles the consistency of mashed potatoes. Season to taste with salt.

name: Fall in Love (with) Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'roma (plum) tomatoes, diced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'cayenne pepper, or more to taste (Optional)'}
steps: Mash avocados, sea salt, garlic powder, and lime juice in a bowl using a fork.. Mix onion, tomatoes, and cilantro into avocado mixture; season with cayenne pepper.

name: My Grandma's Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh chile de arbol peppers, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed (one pit reserved)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped roma tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'name': 'whole peeled tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}
steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Arrange chile peppers on a baking sheet.. Toast chile peppers in the preheated until browned, about 7 minutes. Remove stems.. Mix avocados, onion, and roma tomatoes together in a bowl.. Blend canned tomatoes, cilantro, toasted chile peppers, garlic powder, and salt in a blender until smooth. Pour about half the blended tomato mixture into avocado mixture. Reserve remaining tomato mixture for another use or for dipping.. Squeeze lime juice into avocado mixture and gently stir until evenly combined. Transfer guacamole to a smaller serving bowl; place reserved avocado pit in the middle to prevent browning.

name: Creamy, Spicy Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomato, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green onions, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salsa, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cumin'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Mash avocado in a large bowl. Stir tomato, green onions, lime juice, salsa, garlic, sour cream, vinegar, cayenne pepper, and cumin with the mashed avocado until evenly mixed; season with salt and black pepper.. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until the flavors blend, about 30 minutes.

name: Asparagus Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '24', 'unit': 'spears', 'name': 'fresh asparagus, trimmed and coarsely chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'salsa'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green onions, sliced'}
steps: Place the asparagus in a pot with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook 5 minutes, until tender but firm. Drain, and rinse with cold water.. Place the asparagus, salsa, cilantro, garlic, and green onions in a food processor or blender, and process to desired consistency. Refrigerate 1 hour, or until chilled, before serving.

name: Holiday Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, minced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano chile peppers, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted and diced'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pear - peeled, cored and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'seedless green grapes, halved'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pomegranate seeds'}
steps: Mix the onion, chile peppers, and salt in a bowl. Fold in the avocados and lime juice. Stir in pear, grapes, and pomegranate. Chill until serving.

name: Our Favorite Most Amazing Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados - halved, pitted, and peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cherry tomatoes, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'shallot, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground multi-colored peppercorns, or to taste'}
steps: Place avocados in a medium bowl and squeeze in lime juice. Add tomatoes, shallot, cilantro, garlic, salt, and pepper. Mash with an immersion blender or a sturdy fork until avocado is mashed and ingredients are combined. Stir gently and serve immediately.

name: Spicy Lentil Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, pitted and peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cooked and cooled truRoots® Organic Sprouted Green Lentils'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Roma tomatoes, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno, seeded and finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely chopped red onion'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced cilantro'}
steps: Mash avocados in medium bowl. Add lentils, tomatoes, jalapeno, onion, lime juice, salt and cilantro. Stir to combine. Chill.

name: Peach Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ancho chile powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced red onion'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced cilantro'}
steps: Mash avocados in a small bowl. Mix in lime juice, ancho chile powder, and salt, leaving chunks if desired. Stir in peach, red onion, jalapeno, and cilantro. Serve immediately.

name: Tzatziki Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced English cucumber'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh dill'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Combine avocados, garlic, and lemon juice in a bowl; mash into a paste using a fork or spoon. Mix in yogurt and sour cream. Stir in cucumber, mint, dill, cilantro, red pepper flakes. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

name: World's Best Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'minced onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, juiced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano chile peppers, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, juiced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pomegranate seeds, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'sprig', 'name': 'cilantro for garnish'}
steps: Combine the onion with the juice of 2 limes in a small bowl; allow the onion to soak in the lime juice for 2 hours. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve and discard the lime juice. Set the onions aside.. Grind the serrano chile peppers, the juice of 2 limes, and salt together in a food processor until smooth; add the avocado and continue processing until creamy and smooth. Transfer the mixture into a small serving bowl; fold the soaked onions, chopped cilantro, and about half the pomegranate seeds into the avocado mixture. Top with the remaining pomegranate seeds and garnish with the cilantro sprig to serve.

name: Julia's New Mexican Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®), softened'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Roma tomatoes, diced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano peppers, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno peppers, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped Hatch green chile peppers (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'hot yellow chile peppers, finely chopped (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'drops', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Pit and spoon avocados into a small bowl and add cream cheese. Mash together until well blended.. Add tomatoes and peppers to the mixture and mix well. Mix in lime juice, garlic powder, hot sauce, and salt. Chill for at least 20 minutes before serving.

name: Spicy Guacamole with Chipotle
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'avocados'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, halved'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped cilantro leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, chopped, divided'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced red onion'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'seeded and diced jalapeno peppers'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced tomato'}
steps: Cut open avocados and scoop all the flesh into a large bowl. Mash with a bean masher or spoon until there are no large chunks of avocado left.. Squeeze lime juice over the avocado. Add cilantro and 1 chipotle pepper with some adobo sauce. Season with salt and pepper; mix to combine. Mix in red onion and jalapenos. Add tomato and mix gently to combine. Chill before serving garnished with remaining chipotle pepper and adobo sauce.

name: Mango Chipotle Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados from Mexico, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mango, peeled, pitted and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'clove garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground dried chipotle pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'Salt to taste'}
steps: Mash avocados in a small bowl, leaving chunks if desired. Mix in mango, garlic, cilantro, lime juice, chipotle powder and salt. Serve immediately.

name: Quick Tomatillo Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocado, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'tomatillo, husked and chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, roughly chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, chopped, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Place avocado, tomatillo, onion, jalapeno, garlic, lime juice, cilantro, cumin, salt, and pepper in a blender; blend until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.

name: Guacamole 3 Ways
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'avocados - halved, pitted, and peeled'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped orange'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crumbled cotija cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'finely chopped jalapeno'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Mash together avocados and lime juice in a bowl. Stir in orange, cilantro, cotija cheese, jalapeno, and salt.

name: Spicy Mango Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe mango, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely chopped white onion'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'hot sauce, or to taste'}
steps: Mash avocados, lime juice, and salt lightly together in a bowl, so some avocado chunks remain. Mix in mango, onion, cilantro, and jalapeno peppers.. Refrigerate guacamole for about 1 hour. Drizzle hot sauce on top before serving.

name: Mango-Tomatillo Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe Hass avocados - halved, pitted, and peeled'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomatillos, husked and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into cubes'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'red onion, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano chile pepper, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'kosher salt to taste'}
steps: Mash avocados in a bowl with a fork until slightly chunky. Fold tomatillos, mango, onion, serrano chile pepper, cilantro, and mint through the avocado; add lemon juice and gently mix. Season the guacamole with salt.. Lay a piece of plastic wrap directly on the surface of the guacamole so it doesn't discolor and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.

name: Black Bean and Corn Guacamole
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 ounce) package', 'name': 'McCormick® Guacamole Seasoning Mix'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ripe avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8.75 ounce) can', 'name': 'whole kernel corn, drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'canned black beans, rinsed and drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped tomato'}
steps: Stir Seasoning Mix and mashed avocados in medium bowl until well blended. Stir in corn, beans and tomato. Cover surface with plastic wrap.. Refrigerate 30 minutes to allow flavors to blend. Stir before serving. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips.
